description:
Alright party people, if there’s one thing we can’t get enough of it’s the art of the par-DIY. That’s why expert Jesi Haack (the best of the best in event planning) to give you the lowdown on DIY party decor. In this e-course she’ll teach you how to choose your concept and nail the perfect color palette. From there it’s on to the DIY-ing—Jesi will walk you through five decor DIYs that can be adapted to any party theme including: dip dyed napkins, table linens, party hats, stir sticks, and a dip-dye coffee filter garland.

Still need the supplies to get started? Head over to the Brit + Co Shop and pick up our party planning kit. It’s got everything you need to get started.
title: Let's Par-DIY
